sentences.sContent: The head teacher said pupils’, parents’ and other teachers’ opinions were sought before the uniform rules were changed.
sentences.sContent_eng: The head teacher said pupils’, parents’ and other teachers’ opinions were sought before the uniform rules were changed.
sentences.sCn: 校长说，在修改这一着装规定之前，已经征求过学生、家长和其他老师的意见。

sentences.sContent: Willie McEwen, acting head teacher at Westray Junior High, said: ''We're delighted that Loganair has come forward with this solution.
sentences.sContent_eng: Willie McEwen, acting head teacher at Westray Junior High, said: ''We're delighted that Loganair has come forward with this solution.
sentences.sCn: 韦斯特雷中学代理校长威利·麦克尤恩说：“我们很高兴洛根航空公司能提出这个解决方案。”

sentences.sContent: In 1955, Meg took up a post as an English teacher at the French convent school and rose to become acting head teacher, despite her Protestant background.
sentences.sContent_eng: In 1955, Meg took up a post as an English teacher at the French convent school and rose to become acting head teacher, despite her Protestant background.
sentences.sCn: 父亲在那里的赫尔大学担任教育学院图书馆馆长。 1955年，母亲在法国修道院学校任英语教师，尽管她信奉新教，不久还是被升为代理校长。

trans.tranOther: the teacher who is in charge of a school
